description: Monitors the relayminers instances within the Homelab Kubernetes environment

options.content:
# Pocket Network Shannon Relayminer

This dashboard monitors the activity of one or multiple relayminers.

To report any issues, please [this page](https://github.com/eddyzags/pocket-network-helm-chart/issues)

panels.description: Number of processed requests per second.
panels.title: Requests/s

panels.description: Amount of processed relay requests and responses.
panels.title: Total Requests/Responses

panels.description: The worst relay request duration in microseconds over the dynamic global range.
panels.title: Relays P95 Lantency

panels.description: Shows the total number of processed relays based on the dynamic range.
panels.title: Total Number of Relays by Service

panels.description: Number of errors relays processed by the Service.
panels.title: Errors by Service

panels.description: service call duration for performance analysis
panels.title: 95th Percentile Relays Duration By Service

panels.description: Number of bytes send by the process over the network
panels.title: Receive Bandwidth

panels.description: Number of bytes send by the process over the network
panels.title: Transmit Bandwidth

panels.description: Number of bytes in heap and currently in use.
panels.title: Heap In Use And Allocated

panels.description: Number of heap bytes waiting to be used.
panels.title: Heap Idle

panels.description: Number of heap bytes obtained from the system.
panels.title: Heap Obtained

panels.description: Number of heap bytes released to OS.
panels.title: Heap Released

panels.description: Total number of heap objects freed.
panels.title: Heap Objects Freed

panels.description: Number of bytes used for garbage collection system metadata.
panels.title: Garbage Collector In Use

panels.description: A summary of the wall-time pause (stop-the-world) duration in garbage collection cycles
panels.title: GC Duration

title: Pocket Network Shannon Relayminer(s)
